最新消息：陈秋实继续“强制隔离”，不给家人说法，不让和本人通话，没有书面通知，没有对限制人身自由的法律解释，律师无法介入。

请签署请愿书：释放陈秋实！
https://t.co/9vz2GOwm0q

陈秋实在武汉已被“强制隔离”25天。
请让他回家！

Update: Chen Qiushi's "forced quarantine" will continue. No explanation to his family. No phone calls. No written notice. No legal interpretation of restrictions on personal freedom. No lawyer can intervene.

Please sign this petition: Free Chen Qiushi!
https://t.co/9vz2GOwm0q

Chen Qiushi has been "forcibly quarantined" in Wuhan for 25 days.
PLEASE let him go home!!!

https://twitter.com/chenqiushi404﻿
